scripts.release: release-it --ci --git.tagName='devops-v${version}' --git.tagAnnotation='Release devops v${version}' --git.commitMessage='chore(devops): release v${version}' --github.release --github.releaseName='devops v${version}' --github.tagName='devops-v${version}' --github.autoGenerate=true --github.draft=true --no-npm.publish --no-npm.tag
